channel.title: AES on jverkamp.com

item.title: update-dotfiles encryption
item.description: I do like having my dotfiles on GitHub. For one, it means that they’re always available when I set up a new machine. For two, others can see them and take whatever is interesting for their own dotfiles. But all that has a disadvantage: what if I want to store my SSH configs?
